[[inst_hl_swp]]
==== HL.SWP

*Syntax:* hl.swp SrcD, SrcD1, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<2]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_swp.svg[HL.SWP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PAIR
